doc:
Emily Mortimer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emily_Mortimer 0 Emily Kathleen Anne Mortimer (born 1 December 1971) is an English actress and screenwriter. She began acting in stage productions and has since appeared in several film and television roles. In 2003, she won an Independent Spirit Award for her performance in Lovely and Amazing. She is also known for playing roles in Match Point (2005), Lars and the Real Girl (2007), Chaos Theory (2008), Harry Brown (2009), Shutter Island (2010), Hugo (2011), the HBO series The Newsroom, and as the voice actress in the English language version of Howl's Moving Castle (2004). Emily_Kathleen_Anne_Mortimer ( born_1_December_1971 ) is an_English_actress_and_screenwriter . She began_acting in stage_productions and has_since_appeared in several_film_and_television_roles . In 2003 , she won an_Independent_Spirit_Award for her_performance in Lovely_and_Amazing . She is_also_known for playing roles in Match_Point_(_2005_)_,_Lars and the_Real_Girl_(_2007_) , Chaos_Theory_(_2008_) , Harry_Brown_(_2009_) , Shutter_Island (_2010_) , Hugo ( 2011_) , the_HBO_series The_Newsroom , and as the_voice_actress in the_English_language_version of Howl 's_Moving_Castle_(_2004_) .
